title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which completely ignores the XML file content
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'

The observed behavior is that nothing happens; it only reactivates the scripted resource editor example. It does not open the file in a new editor as expected.
EB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ:

5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'

The expected behavior is that a new editor should open for the file, as the editor type is different.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new basic project
2. Create a new file named test.xml
3. Make sure the editor used is the scripted resource editor example
4. Select test.xml in the Navigator
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'

The expected result is that a new editor, specifically the Default Text Editor, should open for the test.xml file. The existing scripted resource editor example should not be reactivated.
